description: Holds a history of bundled episodes linked to or unlinked from the claim; also includes line-level link information.

columns.name: CLAIM_PRINT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the claim print record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: BND_EPSD_INST_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Instant that this episode was linked/unlinked.

columns.name: BND_EPSD_EPISODE_ID
columns.description: Bundled episode record associated with this history line.

columns.name: BND_EPSD_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The action performed on the corresponding episode (link/unlink).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Link


Unlink

columns.name: BND_EPSD_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description:
The source of the action performed on this claim to the related bundled episode (user/system/automation).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


User


Visit Association


Auto Link


Auto Creation


Auto Link Via Transform


Auto Link Via Association


Auto Removal

columns.name: BND_EPSD_USER_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the user who performed the corresponding action on the related episode.

columns.name: BND_EPSD_LINKED_INCL_CLM_LNS
columns.description: Holds a comma-delimited string of claim lines linked to the related episode if only part of the claim should be linked and if the number of lines to link is <= 50% of the claim line count.

columns.name: BND_EPSD_LINKED_EXCL_CLM_LNS
columns.description: Holds a comma-delimited string of claim lines excluded from the related episode if only part of the claim should be linked and if the number of lines to link is > 50% of the claim line count.
